meanings.definition: A car body style with a sloping rear window and trunk lid that forms a distinct angle.
meanings.sent1: The sleek notchback design of the car made it look very modern.
meanings.sent2: I prefer driving a notchback because of its unique shape.
meanings.sent3: The notchback car felt like a futuristic spaceship cruising down the road.
meanings.sent4: Her notchback car cut through the wind like a sharp blade.
meanings.sent5: The notchback car's rear window gave it a cool, sporty look.

meanings.definition: To cut a V-shaped groove or indentation into something.
meanings.sent1: He carefully notchbacked the wood to create a perfect joint.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter notchbacks the edges for a snug fit.
meanings.sent3: She notchbacked the paper to make a unique bookmark.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor notchbacked the clay to add intricate details.
meanings.sent5: Notchbacking the metal required precision and skill.

meanings.definition: A small cut or nick in an object.
meanings.sent1: There was a tiny notchback on the edge of the table.
meanings.sent2: The old book had a notchback on its cover from years of use.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally made a notchback on the new phone screen.
meanings.sent4: The antique vase had a delicate notchback from its history.
meanings.sent5: The notchback on the mirror was barely noticeable but added character.
